artigos.title: The Anacrusis Gets A New Update, Big Discount, And Free Weekend Session In June
artigos.description: A new update for The Anacrusis goes live on June 8, and to celebrate, developer Stray Bombay has confirmed that the PC version of the game will be available for free on Steam from June 9-12. The early access title will also be on sale for 50% off on Steam from June 9 to July 7 and on Xbox from June 14-20.
